mapper.insert: insert into hk_summary ( index_name,rule,app,index_val1,index_val2,index_val3,days,hours, minutes,seconds,biz_type,create_time,uuid ) values ( #{indexName},#{rule},#{app}, #{val1},#{val2},#{val3}, #{days}, #{hours},#{minutes},#{seconds}, #{bizType},#{createTime},#{uuid}) on duplicate key update index_val1 = index_val1+ #{val1}, index_val2 = index_val2+ #{val2}, index_val3 = index_val3+ #{val3}
mapper.select:
select rule, app, index_val1 as totalCount, index_val2 as hitCount, convert(index_val2/index_val1,decimal(8,2)) as ratio, seconds from hk_summary where 1=1
and app = #{app}
and seconds between UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startTime}) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime})
order by seconds desc
